00028 /*
00029  * This file is part of Lustre, http://www.lustre.org/
00030  *
00031  * Author: Nathan Rutman <nathan.rutman@sun.com>
00032  *
00033  * Kernel <-> userspace communication routines.
00034  * Using pipes for all arches.
00035  */
00036 
00037 #include <unistd.h>
00038 #include <fcntl.h>
00039 #include <string.h>
00040 #include <errno.h>
00041 
00042 #include <lustre/lustreapi.h>
00043 
00044 #include "lustreapi_internal.h"
00045 
00052 int libcfs_ukuc_start(struct lustre_kernelcomm *link,
00053                       int group, int rfd_flags)
00054 {
00055         int pfd[2];
00056         int rc;
00057 
00058         link->lk_rfd = link->lk_wfd = LK_NOFD;
00059 
00060         if (pipe(pfd) < 0)
00061                 return -errno;
00062 
00063         if (fcntl(pfd[0], F_SETFL, rfd_flags) < 0) {
00064                 rc = -errno;
00065                 close(pfd[0]);
00066                 close(pfd[1]);
00067                 return rc;
00068         }
00069 
00070         memset(link, 0, sizeof(*link));
00071         link->lk_rfd = pfd[0];
00072         link->lk_wfd = pfd[1];
00073         link->lk_group = group;
00074         link->lk_uid = getpid();
00075         return 0;
00076 }
00077 
00078 int libcfs_ukuc_stop(struct lustre_kernelcomm *link)
00079 {
00080         int rc;
00081 
00082         if (link->lk_wfd != LK_NOFD)
00083                 close(link->lk_wfd);
00084         rc = close(link->lk_rfd);
00085         link->lk_rfd = link->lk_wfd = LK_NOFD;
00086         return rc;
00087 }
00088 
00093 int libcfs_ukuc_get_rfd(struct lustre_kernelcomm *link)
00094 {
00095         return link->lk_rfd;
00096 }
00097 
00098 #define lhsz sizeof(*kuch)
00099 
00109 int libcfs_ukuc_msg_get(struct lustre_kernelcomm *link, char *buf, int maxsize,
00110                         int transport)
00111 {
00112         struct kuc_hdr *kuch;
00113         int rc = 0;
00114 
00115         memset(buf, 0, maxsize);
00116 
00117         while (1) {
00118                 /* Read header first to get message size */
00119                 rc = read(link->lk_rfd, buf, lhsz);
00120                 if (rc <= 0) {
00121                         rc = -errno;
00122                         break;
00123                 }
00124                 kuch = (struct kuc_hdr *)buf;
00125 
00126                 if (kuch->kuc_magic != KUC_MAGIC) {
00127                         llapi_err_noerrno(LLAPI_MSG_ERROR,
00128                                           "bad message magic %x != %x\n",
00129                                           kuch->kuc_magic, KUC_MAGIC);
00130                         rc = -EPROTO;
00131                         break;
00132                 }
00133 
00134                 if (kuch->kuc_msglen > maxsize) {
00135                         rc = -EMSGSIZE;
00136                         break;
00137                 }
00138 
00139                 /* Read payload */
00140                 rc = read(link->lk_rfd, buf + lhsz, kuch->kuc_msglen - lhsz);
00141                 if (rc < 0) {
00142                         rc = -errno;
00143                         break;
00144                 }
00145                 if (rc < (kuch->kuc_msglen - lhsz)) {
00146                         llapi_err_noerrno(LLAPI_MSG_ERROR,
00147                                           "short read: got %d of %d bytes\n",
00148                                           rc, kuch->kuc_msglen);
00149                         rc = -EPROTO;
00150                         break;
00151                 }
00152 
00153                 if (kuch->kuc_transport == transport ||
00154                     kuch->kuc_transport == KUC_TRANSPORT_GENERIC) {
00155                         return 0;
00156                 }
00157                 /* Drop messages for other transports */
00158         }
00159         return rc;
00160 }
